version_description:
WATCH MORE. PLAY MORE. Our app keeps getting better! Don’t miss out and update today! 

-NEW GAMES: Practice your spy skills with K.C. Undercover!
 
-GOODBYE TO BUGS: Play games without the fuss! We squished a few of those pesky bugs for even better playtime. 
 
-WISH LIST: Can’t download right now? Just add us to your App Store Wish List for later.

WATCH MORE. PLAY MORE. Our app keeps getting better! Don’t miss out and update today! 

-NEW GAME UPDATES: New activities  added to Sticker Stacker and Slide Me Crazy! 

-GOODBYE TO BUGS: Play games without the fuss! We squished a few of those pesky bugs for even better playtime. 

-WISH LIST: Can’t download right now? Just add us to your App Store Wish List for later.

WATCH MORE. PLAY MORE. Our app keeps getting better! Don’t miss out and update today! 

-BYE BYE BUGS: We got rid of a few  silly bugs that were causing trouble. 

-COMING SOON: We have a ton of awesome games coming soon--including games for the upcoming original movie, Disney Descendants! Don't forget to come back to the app and check for more updates.

WATCH MORE. PLAY MORE. Our app is new and improved! Don’t miss out and update today! 
 
-BRAND NEW DESIGN: The WATCH Disney Channel app has a brand new design that makes it easier than ever to find your favorite shows and the latest episodes— including an updated navigation bar, home screen and more!
 
-VIDEO FLAGS: Look for these flags to know when new episodes are available or to keep track of when your favorite videos are expiring. 
   
-BUGS, BE GONE!: We got rid of a few silly bugs that were causing trouble.

-SHOW US SOME LOVE: If you love our app—tell us in the app store! We want to hear from you.  If you're having any issues, please contact us at http://watchdisneychannel.go.com/feedback.  It's the quickest and easiest way for us to fix any problems you're having.

WATCH MORE. PLAY MORE. Our app keeps getting better! Don’t miss out and update today.
 
What’s changed?
o   GOODBYE TO BUGS: We squished a few of those pesky bugs that were causing trouble.
o   MORE GAMES. MORE LEVELS. Keep playing!

Can’t wait for a new episode to air on TV?  Now new episodes* premiere on the Disney Channel app at the beginning of the day they air! 

*Certain restrictions may apply.
Bug fixes

-You asked. We listened. Extend playback on an external screen using a tethered cable. 
-Bug fixes
Bug Fixes.
Bug Fixes.
Bug Fixes.
Bug Fixes.

- Discover new shows with related show recommendations at the end of each episode
- Bug fixes

Now when you enter your pay TV provider subscription credentials on your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV, you get immediate access to content included in your pay TV package across apps that support single sign-on. You no longer need to enter your pay TV user name and password for each app!
Bug Fix.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

We've moved all of your favorite Disney Junior, Disney XD and Disney Channel shows and games to DisneyNOW.  Download it today for the best of Disney TV - all in one place!
 
This update address bug fixes and improvements to enhance your DisneyNOW experience.  Thank you for your patience as we continue to make enhancements!

•Catch the Descendants 2 premieres on July 21st!
•Bug fixes

The ALL NEW DisneyNOW app brings you Disney Channel, Disney XD and Disney Junior shows, movies and games – all in one place!  We’ve added features such as Disney Emojis and favorite lists, making the DisneyNOW experience just for you!

·         The NEW DisneyNOW app brings you Disney Channel, Disney XD and Disney Junior shows, DCOMs and games – all in one place!  We’ve added features such as Disney Emojis and favorite lists, making the DisneyNOW experience just for you!
·         This update resolves an issue with a missing TV provider logo.  Thank you for your patience as we continue to address bugs and make improvements to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

•The NEW DisneyNOW app brings you Disney Channel, Disney XD and Disney Junior shows, DCOMs and games – all in one place!  We’ve added features such as Disney Emojis and favorite lists, making the DisneyNOW experience just for you!
•This update includes fixes to enhance gameplay, addresses authentication issues, performance optimization and bug fixes.  Thank you for your patience as we continue to make improvements to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

-Unwrap new videos, games and activities in the 25 Days of Christmas Countdown! 
-We’ve added snowfall effects and surprises to spread the holiday cheer!
-The gift that keeps on giving – for every gift you open, DisneyNOW will donate one dollar to Toys for Tots, up to a maximum of $50,000.  
-DisneyNOW app brings you Disney Channel, Disney XD and Disney Junior shows, DCOMs and games – all in one place!

-This update addresses app crashes.  Thank you for your patience as we continue to make improvements!
-Unwrap new videos, games and activities in the 25 Days of Christmas Countdown! 
-We’ve added snowfall effects and surprises to spread the holiday cheer!

We've moved all of your favorite Disney Junior, Disney XD and Disney Channel shows and games to DisneyNOW.  Download it today for the best of Disney TV - all in one place!
 
This update address bug fixes and improvements to enhance your DisneyNOW experience.  Thank you for your patience as we continue to make enhancements!

- Disney Junior has a new home in DisneyNOW - set your DisneyNOW profile and create an experience for preschoolers to get ONLY Disney Junior shows, games and more! 

- We’ve added a DuckTales (woo-oo!) theme and hidden animations. 

- We’ve moved all of your favorite Disney Junior, Disney XD and Disney Channel shows and games to DisneyNOW.  Download it today for the best of Disney TV – all in one place!

We’ve moved all of your favorite Disney Junior, Disney XD and Disney Channel shows and games to DisneyNOW. Download it today for the best of Disney TV - all in one place!

We hear you and we’ve been working behind the scenes to significantly reduce the crash rate – an app crashing while you’re playing your favorite game is NEVER fun!  We’re always looking for ways to improve so keep the feedback coming!

We’ve moved all of your favorite Disney Junior, Disney XD and Disney Channel shows and games to DisneyNOW. Download it today for the best of Disney TV - all in one place!

We hear you and we’ve been working behind the scenes to significantly reduce the crash rate – an app crashing while you’re playing your favorite game is NEVER fun!  We’re always looking for ways to improve so keep the feedback coming!

- Introducing DuckTales Treasure Hunt LIVE! Watch DuckTales on Disney Channel every night to look for the secret treasure, then find it in the Treasure Hunt LIVE! game in DisneyNOW! Update the app now and start playing!
- This update addresses bug fixes and updates to Disney Channel Original Movies tab.
- We’ve added a DuckTales (woo-oo!) theme and hidden animations.

- Start SEARCHING! Find and watch your favorite Disney shows using the new search functionality!
- Introducing DuckTales Treasure Hunt LIVE! Starting May 1st, watch DuckTales on Disney Channel every night to look for the secret treasure, then find it in the Treasure Hunt LIVE! game in DisneyNOW! Update the app now and start playing!
- This update addresses bug fixes.
- Discover the DuckTales (woo-oo!) theme and hidden animations throughout the app.

- Watch DuckTales on Disney Channel every day through May 24 to look for a secret treasure, then find it in the DuckTales Treasure Hunt LIVE! game in DisneyNOW to win an in-app surprise!
- Vote for the Radio Disney Music Awards in the DisneyNOW app and help your favorite artists win an ARDY!
- This update addresses improvements to enhance your gameplay experience. Thank you for your patience as we continue to make enhancements!

- We’ve added a summer theme and hidden animations.
- You can now update your Emoji with Ardy from Radio Disney Music Awards!
- This update addresses crash issues for a smoother gameplay experience

- We've updated Super Arcade with T.O.T.S., Amphibia, Big City Greens, and Fancy Nancy games

- Add fun T.O.T.S. and Amphibia themed filters to your selfies with Disney Snaps!

- Play through game levels to meet the characters and customize Descendants 3 rooms in “Wicked Quests” (available August 2)

- We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!
We’ve squashed a few bugs behind the scenes to enhance your DisneyNOW viewing experience!

Make your own iconic “Disney Channel Wand ID” with the Be a Disney Channel Star activity.

We’ve added new games including DisneyNOW Snaps and Duck Tales Block Party. Update today to start playing!
Minor bug fixes
Here’s the sitch, we’ve brought the action to DisneyNOW!  Discover Kim Possible surprises and animations in the app.

-We believe the best birthdays are birthdays that are celebrated! Providing your birthdate in DisneyNOW allows us to surprise you on your special day with a fun animation.

-ON NOW is easily accessible from the all shows page so you can watch your favorite Disney Channel, Disney Junior and Disney XD shows live!

We fixed an issue with voice search allowing you to search for your favorite Disney shows!
Noticed some faves missing from your list?  They’re back and easily accessible from your home screen.
We fixed an issue with app functionality to improve your DisneyNOW viewing experience!

TRICKS & TREATS – Discover spooktacular Halloween animations from your favorite Disney characters throughout the app!
HALLOVEEN FUN – Check back daily in October for fang-tastic videos, games and activities.
We fixed an issue causing app crashes to improve your DisneyNOW viewing experience.

- TRICKS & TREATS – Discover spooktacular Halloween animations from your favorite Disney characters throughout the app!

- HALLOVEEN FUN – Check back daily in October for fang-tastic videos, games and activities.
Minor bug fixes

-Unwrap new mini-games daily with 25 Days of Gifts! 
-The gift that keeps on giving – when enough gifts in the 25 Days of Gifts activity are unwrapped, DisneyNOW will make a donation to Toys for Tots**.
-We’ve added winter animations to spread the holiday cheer!
We’ve fixed an issue with Chromecast play back.  Thank you for your patience as we improve your DisneyNOW viewing experience!
Here’s the sitch, we’ve brought the action to DisneyNOW!  Discover Kim Possible surprises and animations in the app.

-We believe the best birthdays are birthdays that are celebrated! Providing your birthdate in DisneyNOW allows us to surprise you on your special day with a fun animation.

-ON NOW is easily accessible from the all shows page so you can watch your favorite Disney Channel, Disney Junior and Disney XD shows live!

•We’ve added new games including Big Hero 6: Bed Bug Blitz game and Fancy Nancy: Photoshoot.  Update today to start playing!

•Color Splash has been updated with new shows including Kim Possible and PJ Masks.  We’re also stepping into the season with spring-themed coloring pages.

•We’ve added new games including Big Hero 6: Bed Bug Blitz game and Fancy Nancy: Photoshoot.  Update today to start playing!

•Color Splash has been updated with new shows including Kim Possible and PJ Masks.  We’re also stepping into the season with spring-themed coloring pages.

Make your own iconic “Disney Channel Wand ID” with the Be a Disney Channel Star activity.

We’ve added new games including DisneyNOW Snaps and Duck Tales Block Party. Update today to start playing!

-New games!  Visit a galaxy far, far away with the new “Star Wars Resistance Racer,” meet the citizens of Amphibia in “Locust Pocus,” play with adorable baby animals in “T.O.T.S. Special Delivery” or read weekly adventures from Auradon in “Descendants 3 Stories.”

-Descendants 3 premieres on Disney Channel August 2nd, 2019.  Look out for wicked surprises and fun animations throughout the app!

-We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

- We've updated Super Arcade with T.O.T.S., Amphibia, Big City Greens, and Fancy Nancy games

- Add fun T.O.T.S. and Amphibia themed filters to your selfies with Disney Snaps!

- Play through game levels to meet the characters and customize Descendants 3 rooms in “Wicked Quests” (available August 2)

- We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

-DisneyNOW All-Star Racers: Start your engines for a brand new racing experience starring your favorite characters from DuckTales and Mickey and the Roadster Racers!

-We’ve updated Disney Junior Puzzles with your favorite adventurous characters from T.O.T.S.

-Bring T.O.T.S., Fancy Nancy and Amphibia characters to life with Color Splash.  

-We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!
We’ve squashed a few bugs behind the scenes to enhance your DisneyNOW viewing experience!

Happy Halloween!  Look for hidden Halloween surprises in this update of DisneyNOW!

- GAME UPDATES: New coloring pages featuring Mickey’s Mixed Up Adventures in Color Splash.

- BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

-NEW GAMES:  Soar to the skies with The Rocketeer, embrace the love of learning with your favorite Disney Junior characters in Ready for Preschool games and help Disney Channel’s newest babysitter manage aliens in Gabby Duran Cosmic Chaos.
-BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

- Open up the app for some holiday magic! We’ve added winter animations to spread the holiday cheer
- Get into the winter spirit with seasonal updates to Color Splash, Snaps, All-Star Racers and Cart Blaster
- Search for everyone’s favorite mouse in the new “Hidden Mickeys” game
- BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

•Zombies have taken over DisneyNOW!  Look for easter eggs featuring the characters from ZOMBIES 2!
•Like Zombies and The Owl House?  Check out new updates for “DisneyNOW Snaps” and “Color Splash.”
•Play the “Witch’s Apprentice” game* and join Luz on a new adventure in the world of “The Owl House.”
•BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

•Show your team spirit for “ZOMBIES 2” with the new “Quest for the Moonstone” game and new chapters of “ZOMBIES 2” Stories every week
•Color Splash Updates: New pages added for “ZOMBIES 2”
•BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

•Play the new “Mira, Royal Detective: On the Case!” game and new levels of “Color Splash” featuring Mira, Royal Detective and ZOMBIES 2.
•BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!
•Starting March 7th, watch ZOMBIES 2 without a TV provider - no login required!

Starting May 12, race with Mickey, Minnie and Goofy in custom augmented-reality tracks you create in your room with “Mickey & Minnie’s Runaway Railway: Adventure Kit.” 

Watch videos in a whole new way by “switching” from two different videos while you watch. The latest “Switch Videos” feature songs from Descendants 3, Zombies 2 and Kylie Cantrall. 

BUG FIXES: We’ve squashed a few bugs to enhance your DisneyNOW experience!

Starting May 12, race with Mickey, Minnie and Goofy in custom augmented-reality tracks you create in your room with “Mickey & Minnie’s Runaway Railway: Adventure Kit.” 

Watch videos in a whole new way by “switching” from two different videos while you watch. The latest “Switch Videos” feature songs from Descendants 3, Zombies 2 and Kylie Cantrall.
